English: You must register your business for VAT with HMRC if its VAT taxable turnover is over the current VAT registration threshold.
Welsh: Mae’n rhaid i chi gofrestru’ch busnes ar gyfer TAW gyda CThEM os yw ei drosiant trethadwy TAW dros y trothwy cofrestru TAW presennol.

English: You can register voluntarily if your turnover is under the threshold, unless everything you sell is exempt.
Welsh: Gallwch gofrestru’n wirfoddol os yw’ch trosiant o dan y trothwy, oni bai bod popeth yr ydych yn ei werthu wedi’i eithrio.

English: These can be found on the C88 document.
Welsh: Gellir dod o hyd i’r rhain yn y ddogfen C88.
Rhif 3 digid yw hwn, er enghraifft 131.

English: Enter the entry processing unit (EPU) number
Welsh: Nodwch rif yr Uned Prosesu Cofnodion (EPU)

English: Enter a three digit entry processing unit (EPU) number
Welsh: Nodwch rif Uned Prosesu Cofnodion (EPU) tri digid

English: This is 6 numbers and a letter, for example 123456Q.
Welsh: Mae hwn yn cynnwys 6 rhif a llythyren, er enghraifft 123456Q.

English: Enter the entry date in the correct format
Welsh: Nodwch ddyddiad y cofnod yn y fformat cywir

Welsh: Mae’n rhaid i ddyddiad y cofnod fod heddiw neu yn y gorffennol

English: Entry date must include a month
Welsh: Mae’n rhaid i ddyddiad y cofnod gynnwys mis

English: Enter the month in the correct format
Welsh: Nodwch y mis yn y fformat cywir

English: Entry date must include a year
Welsh: Mae’n rhaid i ddyddiad y cofnod gynnwys blwyddyn

English: Enter the year in the correct format
Welsh: Nodwch y flwyddyn yn y fformat cywir

Welsh: Mae’n rhaid i ddyddiad y cofnod fod yn ddyddiad go iawn

English: If you do not provide enough information, we may be unable to process your application.
Welsh: Os na fyddwch yn rhoi digon o wybodaeth, mae’n bosibl na fyddwn yn gallu prosesu’ch cais.
Gallwch roi gwybod i ni am:

English: changes in currency or exchange rates
Welsh: newidiadau mewn arian cyfred neu gyfraddau cyfnewid

English: any preferential rates or schemes that applied
Welsh: unrhyw gynlluniau neu gyfraddau ffafriol a oedd yn berthnasol

English: whether any items were replaced or refunded, and why
Welsh: p’un a gafodd unrhyw eitemau eu newid neu eu had-dalu, a pham

English: changes to the value of goods
the number of items or goods
a description of the items or goods

What do you want to reclaim?

Gallwch wirio gyda’ch cludwr os nad ydych yn siŵr.

Dewiswch bob un sy’n berthnasol.

English: What do you want to reclaim?
Select what you want to reclaim
Welsh: Dewiswch beth yr hoffech ei adennill

English: These are the documents we must have to process your claim.
Welsh: Dyma’r dogfennau y mae’n rhaid i ni eu cael i brosesu’ch hawliad.

English: Types of files you can upload
Welsh: Y mathau o ffeiliau y gallwch eu huwchlwytho

English: C88, which authorises imports from the country of origin
Welsh: C88, sy’n awdurdodi mewnforion o’r wlad wreiddiol

English: E2, which authorises imports from the country of origin
Welsh: E2, sy’n awdurdodi mewnforion o’r wlad wreiddiol

English: Commercial invoice, which shows the value of the goods
Welsh: Anfoneb fasnachol, sy’n dangos gwerth y nwyddau

English: Substitute entry, which shows changes made to the original entry
Welsh: Cofnod cyfnewid, sy’n dangos newidiadau a wnaed i’r cofnod gwreiddiol

English: Evidence that the invoice has been corrected in another currency
Welsh: Tystiolaeth bod yr anfoneb wedi’i chywiro mewn arian cyfred arall

English: Airway bill or bill of lading that show shipping details
Welsh: Bil teithrestr awyr neu bil llwytho, sy’n dangos y manylion cludo

English: Proof of origin documents, such as a GSP certificate
Welsh: Dogfennau tystiolaeth o darddiad, megis tystysgrif GSP

English: Proof of the quota and commodity codes that are being claimed against
Welsh: Tystiolaeth o’r cwota a’r codau nwyddau y gwneir hawliad yn eu herbyn

English: You may also include additional documents if you think they are relevant.
Welsh: Gallwch hefyd gynnwys dogfennau ychwanegol os ydych yn credu eu bod yn berthnasol.

English: Do you want to use your own reference?
Welsh: A hoffech ddefnyddio’ch cyfeirnod eich hun?

English: Do you want to use your own reference?
Welsh: A hoffech ddefnyddio’ch cyfeirnod eich hun?

English: This could be an employee reference or something else to help identify who is making this application. We will only include it in letters about this application.
Welsh: Gallai hyn fod yn gyfeirnod cyflogai neu’n rhywbeth arall i helpu i amlygu pwy sy’n gwneud y cais hwn. Byddwn ond yn ei gynnwys mewn llythyrau ynghylch y cais hwn.

English: You will be given a separate application reference when this application is complete.
Welsh: Rhoddir cyfeirnod cais ar wahân i chi pan fydd y cais hwn wedi’i gwblhau.

English: Do you want to use your own reference?
Welsh: A hoffech ddefnyddio’ch cyfeirnod eich hun?

English: The reference must be 50 characters or less
Welsh: Rhaid i’r cyfeirnod fod yn 50 o gymeriadau neu lai

English: Select yes if you want to use your own reference
Welsh: Dewiswch ‘Iawn’ os hoffech ddefnyddio’ch cyfeirnod eich hun

English: What is the name on the import documents?
Welsh: Beth yw’r enw ar y dogfennau mewnforio?

English: What is the name on the import documents?
Welsh: Beth yw’r enw ar y dogfennau mewnforio?

English: Enter the name on the import documents
Welsh: Nodwch yr enw sydd ar y dogfennau mewnforio

English: Name on the import documents must be 512 characters or less
Welsh: Mae’n rhaid i’r enw sydd ar y dogfennau mewnforio fod yn 512 o gymeriadau neu lai

English: Name on the import documents must only include letters a to z, numbers 0 to 9, ampersands (&), apostrophes, commas, exclamation marks, forward slashes, full stops, hyphens, round brackets, speech marks, underscores and spaces
Welsh: Mae’r enw sydd ar y dogfennau mewnforio ond yn gallu cynnwys y llythrennau a i z, y rhifau 0 i 9, ampersandau (&), collnodau, comas, ebychnodau, blaenslaesau, atalnodau llawn, cysylltnodau, cromfachau crwn, dyfynodau, tanlinellau a bylchau
Mae’n rhaid i’r rhif ffôn fod yn 11 rhif

English: Enter a phone number beginning with 0
Welsh: Nodwch rif ffôn gan ddechrau gyda 0

English: Enter a UK landline or mobile number, like 07700 900 982 or 01632 960 001.
Welsh: Nodwch rif ffôn llinell dir neu rif ffôn symudol yn y DU, fel 07700 900 982 neu 01632 960 001.
Sut y gallwn gysylltu â chi?
Sut y gallwn gysylltu â chi?

English:
We will use these details if we need to contact you for further information.

Select at least one option.
Welsh:
Byddwn yn defnyddio’r manylion hyn os bydd angen i ni gysylltu â chi i gael rhagor o wybodaeth.

Dewiswch o leiaf un opsiwn.

English: Select if we can contact you by email
Welsh: Dewiswch p’un a allwn gysylltu â chi drwy e-bost neu beidio

English: Email Address must be 85 characters or less
Welsh: Mae’n rhaid i’r cyfeiriad e-bost fod yn 85 o gymeriadau neu lai

English: Enter an email address in the correct format, like name@example.com
Welsh: Nodwch gyfeiriad e-bost yn y fformat cywir, megis enw@enghraifft.com

English: Select who you want to send the repayment to
Welsh: Dewiswch at bwy yr hoffech anfon yr ad-daliad

English: Select how you want to receive the repayment
Welsh: Dewiswch sut yr hoffech gael yr ad-daliad

English: What is a current month amendment?
A current month amendment is an accounting adjustment to a deferment account.
Welsh: Mae diwygiad mis cyfredol yn addasiad cyfrifyddu a wneir i gyfrif gohirio.

English: This can only be made if the original payment was from a deferment account.
Welsh: Gellir ond gwneud hyn os oedd y taliad gwreiddiol yn dod o gyfrif gohirio.

English: What is the importer’s EORI number?
Welsh: Beth yw rhif EORI y mewnforiwr?

English: What is the importer’s EORI number?
Welsh: Beth yw rhif EORI y mewnforiwr?

English: This is 2 letters, followed by either 12 or 15 numbers, like ‘GB123456789123’ or ‘GB123456789123000’.
Welsh: Mae hyn yn 2 lythyren, wedi’u dilyn gan naill ai 12 neu 15 rhif, fel ‘GB123456789123’ neu ‘GB123456789123000’.

English: Enter the importer’s EORI number in the correct format
Welsh: Nodwch rif EORI y mewnforiwr yn y fformat cywir

English: Does the importer have an EORI number?
Welsh: A oes gan y mewnforiwr rif EORI?

English: Does the importer have an EORI number?
Welsh: A oes gan y mewnforiwr rif EORI?

English: Does the importer have an EORI number?
Welsh: A oes gan y mewnforiwr rif EORI?

English: Select yes if the importer has an EORI number
Welsh: Dewiswch ‘Iawn’ os oes gan y mewnforiwr rif EORI

English: EORI numbers are needed to move goods between Great Britain and other countries.
Welsh: Mae angen rhifau EORI i symud nwyddau rhwng Prydain Fawr a gwledydd eraill.

English: If a trader is registered for VAT, they will already have an EORI number.
Welsh: Os yw masnachwr wedi’i gofrestru ar gyfer TAW, bydd ganddo rif EORI yn barod.

English: Private individuals do not need an EORI number where goods are imported for personal use.
Welsh: Nid oes angen rhif EORI ar unigolion preifat os yw nwyddau’n cael eu mewnforio at ddefnydd personol.
A yw’r mewnforiwr wedi’i gofrestru ar gyfer TAW?
A yw’r mewnforiwr wedi’i gofrestru ar gyfer TAW?
A yw’r mewnforiwr wedi’i gofrestru ar gyfer TAW?

English: Select yes if the importer is VAT registered
Welsh: Dewiswch ‘Iawn’ os yw’r mewnforiwr wedi’i gofrestru ar gyfer TAW

English: Do not include any agent fees.
Welsh: Peidiwch â chynnwys unrhyw ffioedd asiant.

English: This should be the total amount of overpayment for all entries. Do not include any agent fees.
Welsh: Dylai hyn fod yn gyfanswm y gordaliad ar gyfer pob cofnod. Peidiwch â chynnwys unrhyw ffioedd asiant.

English: Amount of VAT that was paid to HMRC
Welsh: Swm y TAW a dalwyd i CThEM

English: Enter the amount of VAT that was paid to HMRC
Welsh: Nodwch swm y TAW a dalwyd i CThEM

English: The amount of VAT that was paid to HMRC must be a number
Welsh: Mae’n rhaid i swm y TAW a dalwyd i CThEM fod yn rhif

English: The amount of VAT that was paid to HMRC must be more than £0
Welsh: Mae’n rhaid i swm y TAW a dalwyd i CThEM fod yn fwy na £0

English: The amount of VAT that was paid to HMRC must £99,999,999,999.99 or less
Welsh: Mae’n rhaid i swm y TAW a dalwyd i CThEM fod yn £99,999,999,999.99 neu lai

English: The amount of VAT that was paid to HMRC must be an amount of money, like £123.45 or £248
Welsh: Mae’n rhaid i swm y TAW a dalwyd i CThEM fod yn swm o arian, megis £123.45 neu £248

English: Amount of VAT that you think should have been paid
Welsh: Swm y TAW y credwch y dylid bod wedi’i thalu

English: For refunded or destroyed goods, this amount can be £0.
Welsh: Ar gyfer nwyddau sydd wedi’u had-dalu neu eu dinistrio, gall y swm hwn fod yn £0.

English: Enter the amount of VAT that should have been paid
Welsh: Nodwch swm y TAW y dylid bod wedi’i thalu

English: The amount cannot be a negative number
Welsh: Ni all y swm fod yn rhif negyddol

English: The amount of VAT that should have been paid must £99,999,999,999.99 or less
Welsh: Mae’n rhaid i swm y TAW y dylid bod wedi’i thalu fod yn £99,999,999,999.99 neu lai

English: The amount of VAT that should have been paid must be an amount of money, like £123.45 or £248
Welsh: Mae’n rhaid i swm y TAW y dylid bod wedi’i thalu fod yn swm o arian, megis £123.45 neu £248

English: The amount of VAT that should have been paid must be a number
Welsh: Mae’n rhaid i swm y TAW y dylid bod wedi’i thalu fod yn rhif

English: The amount of VAT that should have been paid cannot be the same as the amount of VAT that was paid to HMRC
Welsh: Ni all swm y TAW y dylid bod wedi’i thalu fod yr un fath â swm y TAW a dalwyd i CThEM

English: The amount of import VAT that should have been paid to HMRC cannot be more than the amount that was paid
Welsh: Ni all swm y TAW mewnforio y dylid bod wedi’i thalu i CThEM fod yn fwy na’r swm a dalwyd

English: Do not include any agent fees.
Welsh: Peidiwch â chynnwys unrhyw ffioedd asiant.

English: This should be the total amount of overpayment for all entries. Do not include any agent fees.
Welsh: Dylai hyn fod yn gyfanswm y gordaliad ar gyfer pob cofnod. Peidiwch â chynnwys unrhyw ffioedd asiant.

English: The amount of Customs Duty that was paid to HMRC must be an amount of money, like £123.45 or £248
Welsh: Mae’n rhaid i swm y Doll Dramor a dalwyd i CThEM fod yn swm o arian, megis £123.45 neu £248

English: How much Customs Duty was paid to HMRC?
Welsh: Faint o Doll Dramor a dalwyd i CThEM?

English: The amount of Customs Duty that should have been paid must £99,999,999,999.99 or less
Welsh: Mae’n rhaid i swm y Doll Dramor y dylid bod wedi’i thalu fod yn £99,999,999,999.99 neu lai

English: The amount of Customs Duty that should have been paid must be an amount of money, like £123.45 or £248
Welsh: Mae’n rhaid i swm y Doll Dramor y dylid bod wedi’i thalu fod yn swm o arian, megis £123.45 neu £248

English: The amount of Customs Duty that should have been paid cannot be the same as the amount of Customs Duty that was paid to HMRC
Welsh: Ni all swm y Doll Dramor y dylid bod wedi’i thalu fod yr un fath â swm y Doll Dramor a dalwyd i CThEM

English: The amount of customs duty that should have been paid to HMRC cannot be more than the amount that was paid
Welsh: Ni all swm y Doll Dramor y dylid bod wedi’i thalu i CThEM fod yn fwy na’r swm a dalwyd

English: Do not include any agent fees.
Welsh: Peidiwch â chynnwys unrhyw ffioedd asiant.

English: This should be the total amount of overpayment for all entries. Do not include any agent fees.
Welsh: Dylai hyn fod yn gyfanswm y gordaliad ar gyfer pob cofnod. Peidiwch â chynnwys unrhyw ffioedd asiant.

English: Amount of other duties that were paid to HMRC

English: Enter the amount of other duties that were paid to HMRC

English: The amount of other duties that were paid to HMRC must be more than £0
Welsh: Mae’n rhaid i swm y tollau eraill a dalwyd i CThEM fod yn fwy na £0

Welsh: Mae’n rhaid i swm y tollau eraill a dalwyd i CThEM fod yn rhif

English: Amount of other duties that you think should have been paid
Welsh: Swm y tollau eraill y credwch y dylid bod wedi’u talu

English: For refunded or destroyed goods, this amount can be £0.

English: Enter the amount of other duties that should have been paid
Welsh: Nodwch swm y tollau eraill y dylid bod wedi’u talu

Welsh: Ni allwn ychwanegu unrhyw wybodaeth at y cais hwn gan ei fod wedi cau. Dylech fod wedi derbyn gohebiaeth drwy’r post yn cadarnhau pam y cafodd eich cais ei gau.

Welsh: Os ydych yn teimlo bod y cais hwn wedi cael ei gau drwy gamgymeriad, gallwch anfon e-bost atom yn {0} gyda’r wybodaeth ychwanegol.

English: You must include the application reference number {0} in the subject header.
Welsh: Mae’n rhaid i chi gynnwys cyfeirnod y cais, sef {0}, yn y pennawd pwnc.
Cyfeirnod y cais sydd wedi cau {0}

English: an airway bill or bill of lading that show shipping details
Welsh: bil teithrestr awyr neu bil llwytho, sy’n dangos y manylion cludo

English: the C88, which authorises imports from the country of origin
Welsh: y ddogfen C88, sy’n awdurdodi mewnforion o’r wlad wreiddiol

English: a commercial invoice, which shows the value of the goods
Welsh: aanfoneb fasnachol, sy’n dangos gwerth y nwyddau

English: the E2, which confirms your import entry has been logged by HMRC
Welsh: y ddogfen E2, sy’n cadarnhau bod eich cofnod mewnforio wedi’i nodi gan CThEM

English: proof of origin documents, such as a GSP certificate
Welsh: dogfennau tystiolaeth o darddiad, megis tystysgrif GSP

English: a substitute entry, which shows changes made to the original entry
Welsh: cofnod cyfnewid, sy’n dangos newidiadau a wnaed i’r cofnod gwreiddiol

English: Check your answers before sending your application
Welsh: Gwiriwch eich atebion cyn anfon eich cais

English: Enter the name as it appears on your bank statement.
Welsh: Nodwch yr enw fel y mae’n ymddangos ar eich cyfriflen banc.

English: evidence that the invoice has been corrected in another currency
Welsh: tystiolaeth bod yr anfoneb wedi’i chywiro mewn arian cyfred arall

English: Additional information must be 1400 characters or less
Welsh: Mae’n rhaid i’r wybodaeth ychwanegol fod yn 1400 o gymeriadau neu lai

English: Add more information to your application
Welsh: Ychwanegwch mwy o wybodaeth i’ch cais

English: Add more information to your application
Welsh: Ychwanegwch mwy o wybodaeth i’ch cais

English: No, I am a representative of the importer
Welsh: Na, fi yw cynrychiolydd y mewnforiwr

English: Provide as much information as possible. This will help us to process your application faster.
Welsh: Darparwch gymaint o wybodaeth â phosibl. Bydd hyn yn ein helpu i brosesu’ch cais yn gyflymach.

English: If you feel we closed this application in error you can email us at {0} with the additional information.
Welsh: Os ydych yn teimlo ein bod wedi cau’r cais drwy gamgymeriad, gallwch anfon e-bost atom yn {0} gyda’r wybodaeth ychwanegol.

English: Multiple entries must all be from the same importer, involve the same reasons for the application and be from before 1 January 2021 or from that date onwards.
Welsh: Mae’n rhaid i gofnodion lluosog ddod o’r un mewnforiwr, cynnwys yr un rhesymau dros y cais a bod o gyn 1 Ionawr 2021 neu o’r dyddiad hwnnw ymlaen.

English: proof of the quota and commodity codes that are being claimed against
Welsh: tystiolaeth o’r cwota a’r codau nwyddau y gwneir hawliad yn eu herbyn
Dogfennau sydd eu hangen arnom gennych
Dogfennau sydd eu hangen arnom gennych

English: Confirm if you are the importer or their representative
Welsh: Cadarnhewch ai’r mewnforiwr neu gynrychiolydd y mewnforiwr ydych chi

English: Select the main reason for making an application
Welsh: Dewiswch y prif reswm dros wneud cais

English: Select who you want HMRC to repay
Welsh: Dewiswch pwy yr hoffech i CThEM ad-dalu

English: This may be information that HMRC has asked for, information you choose to add or a request to cancel your application.
Welsh: Gall hyn fod yn wybodaeth y mae CThEM wedi gofyn amdani, gwybodaeth y byddwch yn dewis ei hychwanegu neu gais i ganslo’ch cais.

English: You can find these on the E2 or C88 documents. If you’re unsure, you can speak to your shipping agent or courier.
Welsh: Gallwch ddod o hyd i’r rhain ar y dogfennau E2 neu C88. Os ydych yn ansicr, gallwch siarad â’ch asiant cludo neu’ch cludwr.

English: You can find these on the E2 or C88 documents.
Welsh: Gallwch ddod o hyd i’r rhain ar y dogfennau E2 neu C88.

English: This has 2 letters, followed by either 12 or 15 numbers. For example, GB123456789123 or GB123456789123000.
Welsh: Mae hwn yn cynnwys 2 lythyren, wedi’u dilyn gan naill ai 12 neu 15 rhif. Er enghraifft, GB123456789123 neu GB123456789123000.

English: the documents for the oldest entry you have listed. We will ask for more information later.
Welsh: y dogfennau ar gyfer y cofnod hynaf rydych wedi’i nodi. Byddwn yn gofyn am ragor o wybodaeth yn nes ymlaen.

English: You can only use this option if you made the original payment using a duty deferment account.
Welsh: Dim ond os gwnaethoch y taliad gwreiddiol gan ddefnyddio cyfrif gohirio tollau y gallwch ddefnyddio’r opsiwn hwn.

English: This must be a UK account that accepts Bacs payments.
Welsh: Mae’n rhaid i’r cyfrif hwn fod yn gyfrif yn y DU sy’n derbyn taliadau Bacs.

Welsh: Nodwch yr enw fel y mae’n ymddangos ar ei gyfriflen banc.

English: Enter the name as it appears on your bank statement.
Welsh: Nodwch yr enw fel y mae’n ymddangos ar eich cyfriflen banc.

English: An indirect representative acts in their own name but on behalf of another party. Both parties accept joint liability for the information provided.
Welsh: Mae cynrychiolydd anuniongyrchol yn gweithredu yn ei enw ei hun ond ar ran parti arall. Mae’r ddwy ochr yn derbyn rhwymedigaeth ar y cyd am yr wybodaeth a ddarperir.

English: Multiple entries must all be from the same importer, involve the same reasons for the application and be from before 1 January 2021 or from that date onwards.
Welsh: Mae’n rhaid i gofnodion lluosog ddod o’r un mewnforiwr, rhaid iddynt gynnwys yr un rhesymau dros wneud y cais, a rhaid iddynt fod o gyfnod cyn 1 Ionawr 2021 neu o’r dyddiad hwnnw ymlaen.
